com.github.wuic.resource
Interface WuicResource

All Superinterfaces:
InputStreamOpener, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractWuicResource, ByteArrayWuicResource, FileWuicResource, HttpWuicResource, InputStreamWuicResource
public interface WuicResource
extends Serializable, InputStreamOpener

Represents a resource provided or to be managed by the WUIC framework.

TODO : refactor Configuration and WuicResource interfaces to manage from Configuration the cache, aggregation and compressions boolean.

Since:
0.1.1
Version:
1.2
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

FileType getFileType()

Returns the file type of this resource.

Returns:

getName

String getName()

Returns the name of the resource. The name is a location relative to the root directory returned by getBaseDirectory().

Returns:
the resource name

Gets the root directory that contains all the files.

Returns:

isBinaryCompressible

Boolean isBinaryCompressible()

Indicates if this resource could be binary compressible.

Returns:
true if compressible, false otherwise

Indicates if this resource is text compressible.

Returns:
true if compressible, false otherwise
